translation: Yylhi āftab vattnh yith be nvuryiyhi krnh.
Th yylhi tarkh (pnnyv gng ārv nishhi) vsụ̄ pyn.
Th yylhi pharr (grd bnạvith hvahs mnz) pknavnh yin.
Th yylhi gobih khor avunttnhi httri httriphyrn (kanhh āshi nh timn khbr hynh vvl).
Th yylhi vḥshy janvr (khvfh htụ̄) sombravnh yin.
Yylhi smndr th dryav (sạry) votlavnh yin.
Th yylhi rvḥ yin (jsmn sintụ̄) ralavnh.
Th yylhi zndh dfn krnh āmczi kvri yiyhi pczhnh.
Zi so kmhi gnah kh bạʿth ạs qtl āmcz krnh.
Th yylhi aʿmal namh yin mczravnh.
Th yylhi āsmạnụ̄ ṭbqh phasvith yin pnnyv jayav nishhi ddalnh.
Th yylhi jhnms (kis nar s) yiyhi ryhh tulnh.
Th yylhi jnt yiyhi nkhh aannh.
Pth shkhṣs lghi pe yikynczhah tmụ̄ ḥạẓr chuh kormut.
Tylhi chuhs bh qsm khyvan timn (āsmạnụ̄ kurn) hund yim (nnụ̄ nyrnh pth) pth chih czlan.
Yim bla rvk ttvk pkan chih rvzan (pth byyhi nnụ̄ nyirith) khttith chih rvzan.
Byyhi rạcz hund qsm yylhi tamich aanhi gtt rkhṣt hyyhi spdun.
Byyhi ṣbḥuk qsm yylhi tamiyuk gash yun laghi.
Be shk chuh yh (qrān) sytthah ʿzt th bzrgy vạlis rsvl sund (prnh āmut) klam.
Yim (ḥq kis dʿūts,rsalt kis tblyghs byyhi rvḥạny ṣlaḥyts mnz) qvt th hmt vạlụ̄ chih (th) ʿrshhi kis mạlkh sndis drbars mnz chih sytthah payhi brrụ̄ (th jah v ʿẓmt vạlụ̄).
(tmam jhann khạṭr) chih vajb alaṭaʿt (tikyazi tihnz aṭaʿte chhe Allah tʿālyā snz aṭaʿt), amant dar chih (vḥy hndụ̄ th zmyn v āsman kyn tmam aulvhy razn hndụ̄ ḥạml chih).
Th (ae lvukv!) yim tohyhi pnnhi ṣḥbt sintụ̄ nvazn vạlụ̄ (Muḥammad ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) chihnh dyvanh (yhi frmavan chih thi chuh ḥq āsan).
Th be shk chuh timav shu (mạlki ʿrsh sund ḥusni mṭlq lamkan kis) gashdar btthis pytth vuchhmut.
Th tim (yʿny nby akrm ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) chihnh ghybs (vnns) pytth balkl bkhyl (ʿrshikụ̄ mạlikn thạvnh tihindi khạṭr kanhh kmy)
Th suh (qrān) chuhnh hrgz kạnshi shyṭani mrdvdsund klam.
(ae bdbkhtv!) pth kvr chihv tohụ̄ (yvutah bodd khzanh tạvith) gczhan.
Yhi (qrān) chuh tmam jhann khạṭr (ṣḥyfh) nṣyḥt.
Tohyhi mnz (hykhi) pth ts shkhṣs khạṭr (aamhi nagh nishhi hdayt ḥạṣl gczihth) yus syzi vathi pytth pakun yczihh.
Th tohụ̄ hykiv ty kynczhah yczhth yhi Allah tʿālyā yczhih yus tmam ʿālmn hund rb chuh.
